ComicInfo.Penciller: Christian Ward,Dominike Stanton,Emma Rios,John Timms,Mike D. Perkins,Mike Perkins,Christian Ward,John Timms,Emma Ríos,Dominike Stanton
ComicInfo.Series: Legend of the Swamp Thing Halloween Spectacular
ComicInfo.Summary:
At the Heart of Man: Years after he was rescued from the swamp by the Swamp Thing, David Rock, now a grandfather returns to the swamp and encounters Swamp Thing again, this time questioning if he was worthy of being saved as a boy.
Age of Discovery: In 1494, a young boy is among a group of explorers who discover a mysterious island of plants in the middle of the ocean.
No Sign of the Enemy: A Japanese soldier on an island in the Pacific lives in isolation for years unaware of the end of World War II and prepares for the arrival of the enemy. His only companion is a small plant who urges him to reach out to the outside world.
Sleeping Giant: A young woman calls upon an ancient plant god to help free her sister from an evil man.
Ring of Stones: A Roman who is sent to rule a colony on behalf of Caesar joins with the Green and uses the powers of the Green to free the people from Caesar's rule.
At the Heart of Trees: Swamp Thing helps find a boy who has gone missing in the swamp who has been protected by the spirit of an old willow tree.
ComicInfo.Writer: James Tynion IV,Julian Lytle,Phillip Kennedy Johnson,Ram V,Vita Ayala,Ram V,James Tynion IV,Julian Lytle,Vita Ayala,Phillip Kennedy Johnson
